text: This list of bridges in Slovakia lists bridges of particular historical, scenic, architectural or engineering interest. Road and railway bridges, viaducts, aqueducts and footbridges are included. {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !Name !Locality !Date ! class="unsortable" width="96px" |Image !class="unsortable"|Notes |- |Apollo Bridge||Bratislava||2005||96px||Road bridge across the River Danube |- |Harbour Bridge (Prístavný most)||Bratislava||1985||96px||Carries D1 motorway and a railway across the River Danube |- |Colonnade Bridge (Kolonádový most)||Piešťany||1933||96px||Road and pedestrian bridge over the River Vah to Spa Island |- |Lafranconi Bridge||Bratislava||1991||96px||Carries D2 motorway over the River Danube |- |Mária Valéria Bridge||Štúrovo ||2001||96px|| Road bridge over the River Danube |- |Bridge of the Slovak National Uprising (Most SNP)||Bratislava||1972||96px|| Cable-stayed road bridge across the Danube |- |Old Bridge (Starý most)||Bratislava||2015|||| Carries trams and pedestrians across the Danube. Rebuilt 2015. |- |Podtureň Viaduct||Liptovský Mikuláš||1983||96px||Carries D1 Motorway over the Vah river valley |- |Považská Bystrica Viaduct || Považská Bystrica||2010||96px||Cable-stayed viaduct carrying D1 motorway |- |Prievoz viaduct||Bratislava||2002||96px||Carries D1 motorway across several streets and the main railway |} Slovakia *
title: List of bridges in Slovakia
